annotations.label: whistle
annotations.description: Piero Giacomelli is looking at his watch and immediately ends this match.

annotations.label: soccer-ball
annotations.description: Diego Farias (Cagliari) received a delightful pass inside the box before slotting the ball past the goalkeeper. What a brilliant finish!

annotations.label: time
annotations.description: 2 min. of stoppage time to be played.

Ambitious effort from Diego Farias (Cagliari). He finds himself in a great position after collecting a precise pass inside the penalty area and goes for goal, but it never troubles the goalkeeper and flies well wide of the right post.
Jose Callejon (Napoli) connected with a pass around the edge of the box, aimed and shot. His attempt went low towards the middle of the target, but Rafael was alert and the score remained the same.
Emanuele Giaccherini (Napoli) makes a yard for himself on the edge of the box after picking up a pass, but produces a poor effort that sails high over the bar.

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: Substitution. Emanuele Giaccherini (Napoli) has come on for Lorenzo Insigne.

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: Marco Sau will be replaced by Diego Farias (Cagliari).

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: Maurizio Sarri has decided to make a change. Arkadiusz Milik (Napoli) replaces Dries Mertens.
Lorenzo Insigne (Napoli) releases a promising shot from the free kick from around 25 metres out. The ball goes towards the middle of the goal, but the goalkeeper makes a save and denies him.

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: A substitution has been made. Nicola Murru is replaced by Paolo Farago (Cagliari).

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Jose Callejon (Napoli) takes the corner kick but the ball only finds the head of an opponent.
Jose Callejon (Napoli) wastes a good opportunity as his pass into the box is blocked by the defence. The referee points to the corner flag and Napoli will take a corner.

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: Maurizio Sarri has decided to introduce fresh legs, with Marko Rog (Napoli) replacing Marek Hamsik.

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: The referee stops play so that a substitution can be made and Artur Ionita leaves the pitch and Joao Pedro (Cagliari) comes on.

annotations.label: soccer-ball
annotations.description: It's 3:0! Dries Mertens feeds Lorenzo Insigne (Napoli) inside the box, who is unmarked and buries the ball in the top right corner.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Faouzi Ghoulam (Napoli) takes the corner, but the opposition's defence is ready and clears the ball to safety.

Raul Albiol (Napoli) leaps high to connect with a well taken corner kick and heads towards the top of the net. Rafael is alert and pulls off a great save to deflect the ball onto the bar. Napoli have been awarded a corner kick.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Faouzi Ghoulam (Napoli) will try to find the head of one of his teammates from a corner kick.
Lorenzo Insigne (Napoli) has an effort from distance but it's blocked. The linesman makes the right call and Napoli will have a corner.
Jose Callejon (Napoli) latches on to a lofted pass and strikes the ball! His attempt flies narrowly wide of the left post.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: The resulting corner from Faouzi Ghoulam (Napoli) is cleared by the defence.
Dries Mertens (Napoli) delivers a long ball, but it lacks enough power to reach his teammates and is intercepted by one of the defenders. Napoli earn a corner.

annotations.label: y-card
annotations.description: This yellow card was deserved. The tackle by Piotr Zielinski (Napoli) was quite harsh and Piero Giacomelli didn't hesitate to show him a yellow card.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: A dangerous looking corner kick from Marek Hamsik (Napoli) is cleared to safety by the defence.

Dries Mertens (Napoli) misses a good chance to score. An inch perfect cross into the box finds Dries Mertens (Napoli) who rises for a header, but sends the ball well over the bar. The referee blows his whistle, Napoli are awarded a corner kick.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Nicolo Barella (Cagliari) launches a powerful cross from the corner into the box, but the ball is intercepted by the defender.

annotations.label: soccer-ball
annotations.description: Goal! Dries Mertens (Napoli) collects a pass and without hesitation fires an unstoppable shot into the bottom left corner.

annotations.label: injury
annotations.description: Fabio Pisacane (Cagliari) requires medical treatment, so the referee stops play and signals for the physio to come onto the pitch.

annotations.label: whistle
annotations.description: The game restarts for the second half.

annotations.label: whistle
annotations.description: The match has reached half time.
The resulting free kick from 24 metres out taken by Marco Borriello (Cagliari) was blocked by the defensive wall, which was perfectly positioned by the goalkeeper.
Cagliari are awarded a free kick on the edge of the box.
Dries Mertens (Napoli) goes on a mazy run through the defence and gets within shooting range inside the box, but his low effort to the middle of the target is thwarted by Rafael.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Faouzi Ghoulam (Napoli) takes the resulting corner which is well defended.
Marek Hamsik (Napoli) tries to slide the ball through to a teammate but it's well blocked by a defender. The referee and one of his assistants signal for a corner kick to Napoli.
Piero Giacomelli blows his whistle and signals a foul after Simone Padoin (Cagliari) brought his opponent down.
Lorenzo Insigne (Napoli) latches on to a precise pass on the edge of the box, but miskicks his shot and the ball goes high over the bar. Poor effort!

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Nicolo Barella (Cagliari) puts a cross into the box from the corner but there is no panic from the opposition and they easily clear.
Marco Sau (Cagliari) received a clever through ball which could have put him in a promising position, but the defence was alert to the danger. Now Cagliari have a corner.
What a chance for Piotr Zielinski (Napoli) as he produced a stunning snap shot from the edge of the box! The goalkeeper was a bit lucky as the ball went just wide of the right post.
The game is interrupted as Lorenzo Insigne (Napoli) is flagged offside.
Lovely skill from Marek Hamsik (Napoli) as he gets away from defenders and unleashes a shot from 45 metres out, but his effort goes just over the bar.
That was close by Dries Mertens (Napoli)! He receives a pass on the edge of the box and shoots, but the ball goes inches wide of the right post.

Lorenzo Insigne (Napoli) is afforded space inside the box after collecting a pass, but the chance is wasted as his shot goes harmlessly over the crossbar. The ball is off of the pitch and it's a goal kick for Cagliari.

Marco Borriello (Cagliari) latches on to a precise defence splitting pass and fires a nice strike from a promising distance towards the bottom right corner. Pepe Reina has a clear sight of it and makes a comfortable save.
Lorenzo Insigne (Napoli) creates some space for himself to pick up a pass on the edge of the box and unleashes a decent strike which goes a whisker over the crossbar.
Jose Callejon (Napoli) is offside and the linesman raises his flag.
Lorenzo Insigne (Napoli) gets on the end of a good pass and from mid range he unleashes a decent strike, but the shot is blocked by the defender.
Jose Callejon (Napoli) attempted to pick out a free teammate inside the box, but Rafael comes off the line to clear the ball away.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Faouzi Ghoulam (Napoli) fails to deliver a decent cross from the corner and the ball goes out of play.
Jose Callejon (Napoli) tries to send a pass but it's blocked. Napoli will have a chance to score from a corner kick.
An unsuccessful long range effort by Dries Mertens (Napoli) after he collected a pass and unleashed his shot. He attempted to surprise the goalkeeper, who easily stopped his shot.
Marek Hamsik (Napoli) finds himself in a promising position after receiving a precise pass. He pulls the trigger but only hits one of the opposition, who gets in the way of his effort.
Lorenzo Insigne (Napoli) is adjudged offside.
The defence had a hard time blocking out the strike from Lorenzo Insigne (Napoli). He didn't hesitate and finished from outside the box right after he had received a pass from his teammate.
Jorginho (Napoli) fashions a shot from the edge of the box after receiving an accurate pass. Rafael makes a comfortable save to stop the effort from flying into the middle of the goal.

annotations.label: soccer-ball
annotations.description: What a magnificent finish! Dries Mertens (Napoli) wonderfully times his run onto a cross and thunders the ball from deep inside the box into the left side of the net!

annotations.label: whistle
annotations.description: The first half has just begun.
The players are on the pitch and Napoli will have the kick off.
Piero Giacomelli is the one to supervise the game today.

annotations.label: lineup1
annotations.description: The starting lineups for this match have been revealed.

Hello to all football fans, we are here to bring you a live commentary of the following match, describing all the most interesting and important moments. We'll make sure you won't miss a thing, so just sit back and have fun.
2:1 has been the most common result for Cagliari this season. 6 of their matches finished with this score.
The last 5 games between these two teams have been goal rich, with an average of 3.8 goals per game.

annotations.label: whistle
annotations.description: Piero Giacomelli is looking at his watch and immediately ends this match.
